name: Gusto Vedir
desc: If a face-up "Gusto" monster on the field is destroyed by battle or sent to your GY: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can send 1 "Gusto" monster from your Deck to the GY, then, you can Special Summon 1 "Gusto" monster from your hand. You can only use each effect of "Gusto Vedir" once per turn.
